97 class stTreeInfoResult{
98  public:
102  virtual ~stTreeInfoResult(){}
103 
107  virtual int GetHeight() = 0;
108 
112  virtual int GetMinHeight() = 0;
113 
118  virtual int GetOptimalHeight() = 0;
119 
123  virtual int GetObjectCount() = 0;
124 
130  virtual double GetLocalFatFactor(int level) = 0;
131 
135  virtual double GetGlobalFatFactor() = 0;
136 
141  virtual double GetMeanObjectSize() = 0;
142 
147  virtual double GetAbsoluteFatFactor() = 0;
148 
153  virtual void Invalidate() = 0;
154 
158  virtual bool HasOptimalTree() = 0;
159 };//end stTreeInfoResult

161 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
162 // Class stTreeInformation
163 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
172 class stTreeInformation: public stTreeInfoResult{
173  public:
180  stTreeInformation(int height, int objectCount);
181 
185  virtual ~stTreeInformation();
186 
190  virtual int GetHeight(){
191  return height;
192  }//end GetHeight
193 
197  virtual int GetMinHeight(){
198  return minHeight;
199  }//end GetMinHeight
200 
205  virtual int GetOptimalHeight(){
206  return optimalHeight;
207  }//end GetOptimalHeight
208 
212  virtual int GetObjectCount(){
213  return objectCount;
214  }//end GetObjectCount
215 
221  virtual double GetLocalFatFactor(int level){
222  Validate();
223  return levelData[level].FatFactor;
224  }//end GetLocalFatFactor
225 
229  virtual double GetGlobalFatFactor(){
230  Validate();
231  return fatFactor;
232  }//end GetGlobalFatFactor
233 
238  virtual double GetMeanObjectSize(){
239  return double(objectSizeSum) / double(objectSizeCount);
240  }//end GetMeanObjectSize
241 
246  virtual double GetAbsoluteFatFactor(){
247  Validate();
248  return bloatFactor;
249  }//end GetAbsoluteFatFactor
250 
255  virtual void Invalidate(){
256  ready = false;
257  }//end Invalidate
258 
266  void UpdateIntersections(int level, int n = 1){
267  Invalidate();
268  levelData[level].Intersections += n;
269  }//end UpdateIntersections
270 
278  void UpdateNodeCount(int level, int n = 1){
279  Invalidate();
280  levelData[level].NodeCount += n;
281  }//end UpdateNodeCount
282 
290  void UpdateObjectCount(int level, int n = 1){
291  Invalidate();
292  levelData[level].ObjectCount += n;
293  }//end UpdateObjectCount
294 
303  void UpdateMeanObjectSize(stSize size){
304  objectSizeSum += size;
305  objectSizeCount++;
306  }//end UpdateMeanObjectSize
307 
315  void UpdateMinHeight(int height){
316  if (height < minHeight){
317  minHeight = height;
318  }//end if
319  }//end UpdateHeight
320 
324  virtual bool HasOptimalTree(){
325  return optimalLevelData != NULL;
326  }//end HasOptimalTree
327 
338  void SetOptimalTreeInfo(int height, int * objectCount, int * nodeCount);
339 
354  void CalculateOptimalTreeInfo(int occupation);
355 
361  stTreeInformation * Clone();
362  protected:
366  struct stLevelInfo{
370  int Intersections;
374  int NodeCount;
378  int ObjectCount;
382  double FatFactor;
383  };//end stLevelInfo
384 
389  struct stOptimalLevelInfo{
393  int NodeCount;
397  int ObjectCount;
402  double BloatFactor;
403  };//end stOptimalLevelInfo
404 
408  int height;
409 
413  int minHeight;
414 
418  double fatFactor;
419 
423  double bloatFactor;
424 
428  int objectCount;
429 
433  stSize objectSizeSum;
434 
438  stSize objectSizeCount;
439 
443  stLevelInfo * levelData;
444 
448  stOptimalLevelInfo * optimalLevelData;
449 
453  int optimalHeight;
454 
463  bool ready;
464 
471  void Validate(){
472  if (!ready){
473  Calculate();
474  }//end if
475  }//end Validate
476 
481  void ResetData();
482 
490  void Calculate();
491 };//end stTreeInformation
492
